name: Jousting
description:
One lance, one life, one input. Only one will survive.

Use your mouse, or touchscreen to charge at your opponent to spear them with your lance. Aim your lance into the ground to use it as a pole-vault and gain aerial superiority. Your lance extends the faster you are going, so attacking is your only hope.

Technical issues:

  • This is my first game, so it's not as polished as I would have hoped for.
  • Refresh the page to remedy all issues 😅
  • This is a 1v1 multiplayer game, so you may need to find your own opponent
  • The server is hosting this on jousting.herokuapp.com so a cold startup can take up to 15 seconds.
